messages.text: Welcome! How can I assist you with COVID-19 testing today?
I'd like to schedule a COVID-19 test
What type of COVID-19 test would you like to schedule?
I prefer a drive-through test
We have a drive-through test available at our main center. Does that work for you?
Yes, that location works for me
Great! What time would you like to schedule your test?
I'll be there at 10 AM
Your appointment is confirmed. Would you like to schedule another test?
I need to schedule another test
